meanings.definition: A dish of cooked meat cut into small pieces and cooked again, usually with potatoes.
meanings.sent1: Mom made a delicious hash for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a tasty hash using leftover roast beef.
meanings.sent3: The hash looked so good that even the picky eater couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: The hash of flavors in the dish created a symphony on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling hash filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.

meanings.definition: A jumble or mixture of things.
meanings.sent1: The drawer was a hash of pens, pencils, and paperclips.
meanings.sent2: The room was in a complete hash after the kids' playdate.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the hash of wires behind the TV was a challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a hash of worries and hopes, all mixed together.
meanings.sent5: The painting was a beautiful hash of colors, blending seamlessly together.
